entries.title_d: The Rebels have attacked one of our command shuttles. The first wave of the Rebel fighters has crippled the shuttle and another wave of fighters is on its way. Travel to the shuttle, assist it with repairs, and help it escape.
entries.title: Endor System: Rescue the Imperial Lambda Shuttle
entries.thanks_5: Nice work, pilot. You are an asset to the Empire.
entries.thanks_4: Nice work, pilot. You are an asset to the Empire.
entries.thanks_3: Nice work, pilot. You are an asset to the Empire.
entries.thanks_2: Nice work, pilot. You are an asset to the Empire.
entries.thanks_1: Nice work, pilot. You are an asset to the Empire.
entries.taunt_5: Don't even try to stop us.
entries.taunt_4: We will find out what is going on around here.
entries.taunt_3: Your shuttle doesn't stand a chance.
entries.taunt_2: Nice try! Better luck next time.
entries.taunt_1: We located your command vessel! Time for some payback.
entries.split_quest_alert: Stand by. We managed to pick up Rebel transmissions taking place while shuttle was under attack. Intercept and inspect that vessel for any information we can use against the Rebellion.
entries.rescue_phase_2: Repairs completed. Escort us to a safe jump point.
entries.rescue_phase_1: Beginning to initiate repairs. We barely managed to get away from those Rebels in one piece.
entries.rescue_abandoned: Pilot! What are you doing...get back here! We cannot survive without your protection.
entries.recovery_success: Well done! We should be in the clear now.
entries.quest_location_d: The shuttle is inside of the Endor system. A navigation waypoint will be supplied to you from the location of its distress signal.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the shuttle until it can reach a safe jump location. Be on the look out for enemy fighters coming to finish the shuttle off.
entries.quest_dock_t: Assist the Imperial Lambda Shuttle with Repairs
entries.quest_dock_d: Dock with the shuttle and assist it with repairs.
entries.panic_5: More Rebels! Keep them off of us.
entries.panic_4: More Rebels! Keep them off of us.
entries.panic_3: Be alert. It looks like we have attacking Rebels on our hands.
entries.panic_2: Be alert. It looks like we have attacking Rebels on our hands.
entries.panic_1: More Rebels! Keep them off of us.
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot you are to return to your superior immediately. The loss of that ship is a serious set back to the Empire. You have a lot of explaining to do.
entries.complete: Well done, pilot. You have proven yourself time and time again.
entries.arrival_phase_2: I don't know how much longer we can hold out. Get here right away.
entries.arrival_phase_1: We are taking heavy fire. Get here on the double.
entries.abort: Pilot! What are you doing...get back here! We cannot survive without your protection.
